attributes.action: Parliament should give the power to decide the brexit issue back to the queen.
attributes.background:
Ok, we have had this debacle where both the people and parliament are unable to make a clear decision.
In this case we should hand the power to make the decision back to the reigning monarch in order to maintain a cohesive community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what powers you would like the Queen to have.

You could start a new petition setting out what powers you would Parliament to transfer to the Queen.
